bullet_summary: Reported by Reuters Top News, France24, NBC World and others

items.title: Rubio, Netanyahu to issue joint press statements today
items.standfirst: United States Secretary of State Marco Rubio, who arrived in Israel on Sunday to discuss the war in Gaza, will take part in a meeting with Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu at 10 am local time...
items.content: United States Secretary of State Marco Rubio, who arrived in Israel on Sunday to discuss the war in Gaza, will take part in a meeting with Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu at 10 am local time...

items.title: Qatar PM urges world to end 'double standards' and hold Israel accountable
items.standfirst: Qatar’s prime minister urged the international community on Sunday to reject “double standards” and hold Israel accountable after an unprecedented strike on Hamas members in Doha. The attack, condemned even by President Donald Trump, prompted an emergency summit, though Washington sent Secretary of State Marco Rubio to Israel in support.
items.content: Qatar’s prime minister urged the international community on Sunday to reject “double standards” and hold Israel accountable after an unprecedented strike on Hamas members in Doha. The attack, condemned even by President Donald Trump, prompted an emergency summit, though Washington sent Secretary of State Marco Rubio to Israel in support.

items.title: Rubio visits Israel amid heightened tensions after attack on Qatar
items.standfirst: Secretary of State Marco Rubio visited Israel over the weekend, signaling that Washington wants answers after Israel’s unprecedented attack on Hamas leaders inside Qatar, another key American partner in the Middle East. NBC News' Keir Simmons reports.
items.content: Secretary of State Marco Rubio visited Israel over the weekend, signaling that Washington wants answers after Israel’s unprecedented attack on Hamas leaders inside Qatar, another key American partner in the Middle East. NBC News' Keir Simmons reports.

items.title: Marco Rubio visits Israel to push for Gaza ceasefire talks
items.standfirst: US Secretary of State Marco Rubio arrived in Israel on Sunday, as Israel intensified its attacks against northern Gaza, flattening another high-rise building and killing at least 12 Palestinians. The trip is taking place after President Donald Trump rebuked Israel over the unprecedented attack against Hamas leaders meeting in Doha on Tuesday.
items.content: US Secretary of State Marco Rubio arrived in Israel on Sunday, as Israel intensified its attacks against northern Gaza, flattening another high-rise building and killing at least 12 Palestinians. The trip is taking place after President Donald Trump rebuked Israel over the unprecedented attack against Hamas leaders meeting in Doha on Tuesday.

items.title: U.S. shows Israel support but seeks answers after Qatar attack stirs anger
items.standfirst: JERUSALEM — President Donald Trump may have hoped to be stitching together the final details of a peace deal, but instead his top diplomat landed in Jerusalem on Sunday to douse blazing tensions between U.S. allies
items.content: JERUSALEM — President Donald Trump may have hoped to be stitching together the final details of a peace deal, but instead his top diplomat landed in Jerusalem on Sunday to douse blazing tensions between U.S. allies

items.content: U.S. Secretary of State Marco Rubio arrived in Israel on Sunday, as Israel intensified its attacks against northern Gaza.(Image credit: Nathan Howard)

items.content: Donald Trump's top diplomat has arrived in the Middle East amid tensions over Israel's attack on Hamas inside Qatar that has upended efforts to broker an end to the Gaza war.

items.title: Final stage of Spain's Vuelta abandoned after police clash with pro-Palestinian protesters
items.standfirst: The final stage of Spain's Vuelta cycling race was abandoned on Sunday afternoon as cyclists were entering Madrid after police clashed with pro-Palestinian protesters in the Spanish capital's centre. Police fired tear gas at the crowds as hundreds of pro-Palestinian protesters knocked down security barriers and surged onto the course.

items.title: Romania summons Russian ambassador after drone breaches country's airspace
items.standfirst: Romania summoned the Russian ambassador to Bucharest on Sunday after a drone was observed breaching the country's airspace on its way to strike targets in Ukraine on Saturday. Poland also scrambled fighter jets last week to shoot down a number of Russian drones that had entered its airspace.

bullet_summary: Reported by France24, Reuters Top News, CBS News

items.title: Actor Owen Cooper from 'Adolescence' becomes youngest Emmy winner at 15
items.standfirst: Searing teen murder saga "Adolescence" was the big winner at Sunday's Emmy Awards, claiming eight prizes including best limited series, while "The Pitt" prevailed in a tight race for best drama at television's equivalent of the Oscars. 15-year-old Owen Cooper, who played Jamie Miller in "Adolescence", won best supporting actor for his role, becoming the youngest ever male actor to win an Emmy.
items.content: Searing teen murder saga "Adolescence" was the big winner at Sunday's Emmy Awards, claiming eight prizes including best limited series, while "The Pitt" prevailed in a tight race for best drama at television's equivalent of the Oscars. 15-year-old Owen Cooper, who played Jamie Miller in "Adolescence", won best supporting actor for his role, becoming the youngest ever male actor to win an Emmy.

items.title: ‘Adolescence’ leads Emmys with 8 wins as ‘The Studio’ claims comedy crown
items.standfirst: Searing teen murder saga “Adolescence” swept Sunday’s Emmy Awards with eight trophies including best limited series, while HBO Max’s “The Pitt” won best drama. Seth Rogen’s Hollywood satire “The Studio” dominated comedy, taking best series and a record 13 Emmys overall, surpassing all previous comedy series tallies.
items.content: Searing teen murder saga “Adolescence” swept Sunday’s Emmy Awards with eight trophies including best limited series, while HBO Max’s “The Pitt” won best drama. Seth Rogen’s Hollywood satire “The Studio” dominated comedy, taking best series and a record 13 Emmys overall, surpassing all previous comedy series tallies.

items.title: Tramell Tillman Makes History With 'Severance' Emmy Win
items.standfirst: Tramell Tillman became the first Black man to win Emmy supporting drama actor for "Severance," breaking a 77-year barrier.
items.content: Tramell Tillman became the first Black man to win Emmy supporting drama actor for "Severance," breaking a 77-year barrier.

clusters.title: Far right makes electoral gains in Germany’s most populous state

items.title: Far right makes electoral gains in Germany’s most populous state

items.content: Alternative for Germany puts centre-ground parties under pressure in North Rhine-Westphalia’s municipal poll

items.title: Far-right AfD’s vote triples in elections in German bellwether state
items.standfirst: Party takes 16.5% of the vote in North Rhine-Westphalia, behind governing CDU and Social DemocratsGermany’s far-right Alternative für Deutschland (AfD) party has more than tripled its support in local elections in the country’s most populous state, a poll seen as Friedrich Merz’s first significant electoral test since he took office as chancellor four months ago.According to exit poll results from North Rhine-Westphalia, Merz’s Christian Democrats won with 34% – about the equivalent of its historically worst result in the same poll in 2020 – while the AfD secured 16.5%. Continue reading...
items.content: Party takes 16.5% of the vote in North Rhine-Westphalia, behind governing CDU and Social DemocratsGermany’s far-right Alternative für Deutschland (AfD) party has more than tripled its support in local elections in the country’s most populous state, a poll seen as Friedrich Merz’s first significant electoral test since he took office as chancellor four months ago.According to exit poll results from North Rhine-Westphalia, Merz’s Christian Democrats won with 34% – about the equivalent of its historically worst result in the same poll in 2020 – while the AfD secured 16.5%. Continue reading...

The poll was seen as a test for Friedrich Merz.

clusters.title: Trump calls on NATO members to stop purchasing Russian oil
clusters.neutral_headline: Trump Urges NATO to Stop Russian Oil Purchases
bullet_summary: The war in Ukraine would end if all NATO countries stopped buying oil from Russia, Donald Trump has said
Reported by France24, Sky News World

items.title: Trump calls on NATO members to stop purchasing Russian oil
items.standfirst: President Donald Trump said Saturday he believes the Russia-Ukraine war would end if all NATO countries stopped buying oil from Russia and placed tariffs on China of 50 percent to 100 percent for its purchases of Russian petroleum. Since 2023, NATO member Turkey has been the third largest buyer of Russian oil, after China and India.
items.content: President Donald Trump said Saturday he believes the Russia-Ukraine war would end if all NATO countries stopped buying oil from Russia and placed tariffs on China of 50 percent to 100 percent for its purchases of Russian petroleum. Since 2023, NATO member Turkey has been the third largest buyer of Russian oil, after China and India.

items.title: Trump urges NATO countries to stop 'shocking' Russian oil purchases
items.standfirst: The war in Ukraine would end if all NATO countries stopped buying oil from Russia, Donald Trump has said.
items.content: The war in Ukraine would end if all NATO countries stopped buying oil from Russia, Donald Trump has said.

ai_summary: Donald Trump wants NATO to stop buying Russian oil.
He believes this would end the war in Ukraine.
Trump also suggested tariffs on Chinese goods.
Turkey is the third-largest buyer of Russian oil.
Trump made the statement on Saturday.
